thread.title: BRIEF-Development Bank Of Southern Africa Appoints Boitumelo Mosako As CFO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Development Bank Of Southern Africa Appoints Boitumelo Mosako As CFO

organizations.name: brief-development bank of southern africa appoints boitumelo mosako
reuters) - development bank of southern africa ltd

text:
April 16 (Reuters) - Development Bank Of Southern Africa Ltd:
* APPOINTMENT OF BOITUMELO MOSAKO AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER EFFECTIVE 01 APRIL 2018
* NEW OPERATING MODEL INCORPORATES THREE FRONT-LINE DIVISIONS - COVERAGE, TRANSACTING AND PROJECT PREPARATION.
* FORMER CFO KAMESHNI NAIDOO AND RIEAZ SHAIK, THEN GROUP EXECUTIVE, INTERNATIONAL FINANCING RESIGNED DURING REVIEW Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
